verses.kjv: The sons of Judah; Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal.
verses.ct: The descendants of Judah were Pharez, Hezron, Carmi, Hur, and Shobal.

verses.kjv: And Reaiah the son of Shobal begat Jahath; and Jahath begat Ahumai, and Lahad. These are the families of the Zorathites.
verses.ct: Reaiah son of Shobal became the father of Jahath, and Jahath became the father of Ahumai and Lahad. These were the clans of the Zorathites.

verses.kjv: And these were of the father of Etam; Jezreel, and Ishma, and Idbash: and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi:
verses.ct: These were the sons of the founder of Etam: Jezreel, Ishma, and Idbash. Their sister's name was Hazelelponi.

verses.kjv: And Penuel the father of Gedor, and Ezer the father of Hushah. These are the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah, the father of Bethlehem.
verses.ct: Penuel was the founder of Gedor, and Ezer was the founder of Hushah. These were the descendants of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah and founder of Bethlehem.

verses.kjv: And Ashur the father of Tekoa had two wives, Helah and Naarah.
verses.ct: Ashur, the founder of Tekoa, had 2 wives: Helah and Naarah.

verses.kjv: And Naarah bare him Ahuzam, and Hepher, and Temeni, and Haahashtari. These were the sons of Naarah.
verses.ct: Naarah gave birth to Ahuzam, Hepher, Temeni, and Haahashtari. These were Naarah's sons.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Helah were, Zereth, and Jezoar, and Ethnan.
verses.ct: Helah's sons were Zereth, Jezoar, and Ethnan.

verses.kjv: And Coz begat Anub, and Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel the son of Harum.
verses.ct: Coz became the father of Anub and Zobebah, as well as the clans of Aharhel son of Harum.

verses.kjv: And Jabez was more honourable than his brethren: and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, Because I bare him with sorrow.
verses.ct: Jabez was more respected than his brothers. His mother named him Jabez, saying, "I gave birth to him in pain."

verses.kjv: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.
verses.ct: Jabez prayed to the God of Israel, "Please bless me and expand my territory! Let your hand be with me and keep me from harm so that I won't suffer!" God gave him what he asked for.

verses.kjv: And Chelub the brother of Shuah begat Mehir, which was the father of Eshton.
verses.ct: Chelub, the brother of Shuah, became the father of Mehir, who was the father of Eshton.

verses.kjv: And Eshton begat Bethrapha, and Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of Irnahash. These are the men of Rechah.
verses.ct: Eshton became the father of Bethrapha, Paseah, and Tehinnah the founder of Irnahash. These were the people of Rechah.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Kenaz; Othniel, and Seraiah: and the sons of Othniel; Hathath.
verses.ct: The sons of Kenaz were Othniel and Seraiah. Othniel's son was Hathath.

verses.kjv: And Meonothai begat Ophrah: and Seraiah begat Joab, the father of the valley of Charashim; for they were craftsmen.
verses.ct: Meonothai became the father of Ophrah, and Seraiah became the father of Joab, the founder of the Valley of Charashim — it was called that because the people there were skilled craftsmen.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh; Iru, Elah, and Naam: and the sons of Elah, even Kenaz.
verses.ct: The sons of Caleb son of Jephunneh were Iru, Elah, and Naam. Elah's son was Kenaz.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Jehaleleel; Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.
verses.ct: The sons of Jehaleleel were Ziph, Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Ezra were, Jether, and Mered, and Epher, and Jalon: and she bare Miriam, and Shammai, and Ishbah the father of Eshtemoa.
verses.ct: The sons of Ezra were Jether, Mered, Epher, and Jalon. Mered's wife gave birth to Miriam, Shammai, and Ishbah the founder of Eshtemoa.

verses.kjv: And his wife Jehudijah bare Jered the father of Gedor, and Heber the father of Socho, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah. And these are the sons of Bithiah the daughter of Pharaoh, which Mered took.
verses.ct: His Judean wife gave birth to Jered the founder of Gedor, Heber the founder of Socho, and Jekuthiel the founder of Zanoah. These were the sons of Bithiah, Pharaoh's daughter, whom Mered married.

verses.kjv: And the sons of his wife Hodiah the sister of Naham, the father of Keilah the Garmite, and Eshtemoa the Maachathite.
verses.ct: The sons of Hodiah's wife, the sister of Naham, were the father of Keilah the Garmite and Eshtemoa the Maachathite.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Shimon were, Amnon, and Rinnah, Benhanan, and Tilon. And the sons of Ishi were, Zoheth, and Benzoheth.
verses.ct: The sons of Shimon were Amnon, Rinnah, Benhanan, and Tilon. The sons of Ishi were Zoheth and Benzoheth.

verses.kjv: The sons of Shelah the son of Judah were, Er the father of Lecah, and Laadah the father of Mareshah, and the families of the house of them that wrought fine linen, of the house of Ashbea,
verses.ct: The descendants of Shelah son of Judah were Er the founder of Lecah, Laadah the founder of Mareshah, and the clans of linen workers from the house of Ashbea.

verses.kjv: And Jokim, and the men of Chozeba, and Joash, and Saraph, who had the dominion in Moab, and Jashubilehem. And these are ancient things.
verses.ct: Also Jokim, the people of Chozeba, Joash, and Saraph, who ruled in Moab, and Jashubilehem. These records are from ancient times.

verses.kjv: These were the potters, and those that dwelt among plants and hedges: there they dwelt with the king for his work.
verses.ct: These were the potters who lived among the gardens and hedgerows. They lived there working in the king's service.

verses.kjv: The sons of Simeon were, Nemuel, and Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, and Shaul:
verses.ct: The descendants of Simeon were Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, and Shaul.

verses.kjv: Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.
verses.ct: Shaul's son was Shallum, whose son was Mibsam, whose son was Mishma.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Mishma; Hamuel his son, Zacchur his son, Shimei his son.
verses.ct: Mishma's descendants were his son Hamuel, whose son was Zacchur, whose son was Shimei.

verses.kjv: And Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters; but his brethren had not many children, neither did all their family multiply, like to the children of Judah.
verses.ct: Shimei had 16 sons and 6 daughters, but his brothers did not have many children. Their entire clan never grew as large as the tribe of Judah.

verses.kjv: And they dwelt at Beersheba, and Moladah, and Hazarshual,
verses.ct: They settled in Beersheba, Moladah, Hazarshual,

verses.kjv: And at Bilhah, and at Ezem, and at Tolad,
verses.ct: Bilhah, Ezem, Tolad,

verses.kjv: And at Bethuel, and at Hormah, and at Ziklag,
verses.ct: Bethuel, Hormah, Ziklag,

verses.kjv: And at Bethmarcaboth, and Hazarsusim, and at Bethbirei, and at Shaaraim. These were their cities unto the reign of David.
verses.ct: Bethmarcaboth, Hazarsusim, Bethbirei, and Shaaraim. These were their towns until David's reign.

verses.kjv: And their villages were, Etam, and Ain, Rimmon, and Tochen, and Ashan, five cities:
verses.ct: Their surrounding settlements included Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Tochen, and Ashan — 5 towns in all.

verses.kjv: And all their villages that were round about the same cities, unto Baal. These were their habitations, and their genealogy.
verses.ct: All the villages surrounding these towns extended as far as Baal. These were their settlements, and they kept their own genealogical records.

verses.kjv: And Meshobab, and Jamlech, and Joshah, the son of Amaziah,
verses.ct: Their leaders were Meshobab, Jamlech, Joshah son of Amaziah,

verses.kjv: And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
verses.ct: Joel, Jehu son of Josibiah son of Seraiah son of Asiel,

verses.kjv: And Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,
verses.ct: Elioenai, Jaakobah, Jeshohaiah, Asaiah, Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaiah,

verses.kjv: And Ziza the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah;
verses.ct: and Ziza son of Shiphi, son of Allon, son of Jedaiah, son of Shimri, son of Shemaiah.

verses.kjv: These mentioned by their names were princes in their families: and the house of their fathers increased greatly.
verses.ct: All those listed by name were leaders of their clans, and their families grew very large.

verses.kjv: And they went to the entrance of Gedor, even unto the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.
verses.ct: They traveled to the outskirts of Gedor, all the way to the eastern side of the valley, searching for grazing land for their flocks.

verses.kjv: And they found fat pasture and good, and the land was wide, and quiet, and peaceable; for they of Ham had dwelt there of old.
verses.ct: They discovered rich, quality pastureland. The region was spacious, undisturbed, and peaceful, because the descendants of Ham had previously lived there.

verses.kjv: And these written by name came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and smote their tents, and the habitations that were found there, and destroyed them utterly unto this day, and dwelt in their rooms: because there was pasture there for their flocks.
verses.ct: During the reign of King Hezekiah of Judah, the men listed above came and attacked the tents and settlements they found there, completely destroying them to this day. Then they settled in their place because there was pastureland for their flocks.

verses.kjv: And some of them, even of the sons of Simeon, five hundred men, went to mount Seir, having for their captains Pelatiah, and Neariah, and Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.
verses.ct: Additionally, 500 men from the tribe of Simeon went to Mount Seir, led by Pelatiah, Neariah, Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.

verses.kjv: And they smote the rest of the Amalekites that were escaped, and dwelt there unto this day.
verses.ct: They defeated the remaining Amalekites who had escaped, and they have lived there to this day.
